thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 16 of 7358
thread.title: Ivan

author: Ivan
title: Ivan
text:
The product range B&H carries and customer service what B&H provides to its customers is one of the best I've ever experienced.
I've been B&H customer for many years now, purchased many items through them and never had a single reason to complain about anything. Keep your standard on the same level as up til now and there will be more and more happy customers.
Thank you to be able doing business with you B&H!
P.S. I live on the West coast and would like to visit your store one day. I'm sure it would be a phenomenal experience.
